content: The National Association of Lawyers for Justice and Peace on Tuesday   challenged senatorial bet Risa Hontiveros to prove that she’s worthy of the people’s trust by spearheading the return  of the P1.761 billion in unauthorized bonuses granted to officers and employees of PhilHealth in 2013 during her term    there as board member.
contentPreview: The National Association of Lawyers for Justice and Peace on Tuesday challenged senatorial bet Risa Hontiveros to prove that she’s worthy of the people’s trust by spearheading the return of the P1.761 billion in unauthorized bonuses granted to officers...
title: Hontiveros dared to return P1.76b in PhilHealth bonuses
